```{r echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r echo=FALSE}
# Manhttan -> de más cercano a más lejano, A-B-D-C
# Euclídea y Chebyshev -> A-B-C-D.

data <- tribble(~x, ~y, ~name, ~class,
                0, 0, "X", "to_classify",
                1, 0, "A", "circle",
                1, 2, "B", "triangle",
                3, 2, "C", "circle",
                0, 4, "D", "triangle")
data$class <- factor(data$class, levels = c("circle", "triangle", "to_classify"))
#rownames(data) <- c("x", letters[1:4])

```

```{r echo=FALSE}
circleFun <- function(center = c(0,0),diameter = 2, npoints = 100){
    r = diameter / 2
    tt <- seq(0,2*pi,length.out = npoints)
    xx <- center[1] + r * cos(tt)
    yy <- center[2] + r * sin(tt)
    return(data.frame(x = xx, y = yy))
}
circle <- circleFun(c(0,0), 7.2, npoints = 100)
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
manhattan <- tibble(x = c(0,-4,0,4), y = c(4,0,-4,0))
```

# Ejemplo 1

```{r echo=FALSE}
data$class <- 
ggplot(data, aes(x, y)) + 
  geom_point(aes(shape = class), size = 6)  +
  scale_x_continuous(limits = c(-5, 5), breaks = -5:5) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(-5, 5), breaks = -5:5) +
  #scale_shape_manual(values=c(1, 2, 4)) +
  coord_fixed() +
  geom_polygon(data = circle, fill = "black", color = "red", alpha = 0.05) +
  geom_polygon(data = manhattan, fill = "black", color = "blue", alpha = 0.05) +
  geom_rect(aes(xmin=-3, ymin=-3, xmax=3, ymax=3), fill = "black", color="green", alpha=0.01) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position="none")
  
```

# V1: Remarcados A, B y D

```{r echo=FALSE}
data <- data %>% mutate(highlight = name %in% c("A","D","B"))
ggplot(data, aes(x, y)) + 
  scale_x_continuous(limits = c(-5, 5), breaks = -5:5) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(-5, 5), breaks = -5:5) +
  coord_fixed() +
  geom_polygon(data = circle, fill = "black", color = "red", alpha = 0) +
  geom_polygon(data = manhattan, fill = "black", color = "blue", alpha = 0) +
  geom_rect(aes(xmin=-3, ymin=-3, xmax=3, ymax=3), fill = "black", color="green", alpha=0) +
  geom_point(aes(shape = class, color = highlight), size = 6)  +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position="none") + 
  scale_color_manual(values=c("#999999", "#E69F00"))
```
